name: Cyber Flux Demo
description:
Cyber Flux is a cooperative, top-down shooter set in the vibrant realm of cyberpunk. It delivers interactive music progression to give the player amusement similar an orchestra performance, complemented with beat matching rhythm to increase player difficulty and rewards player with critical hits on opponents.

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/3dBKey8

Twitter: https://twitter.com/RizeAbovStudio

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/ultimateqball

I'm live on Twitch every Mondays-Fridays and sometimes Saturdays
